questions.question: A type of titration where the analyte contains all other reagents except the sample is called -----------

explanations.a: Used for metal ions with chelating agents.
explanations.c: The titrant reacts with an added reagent before reacting with the analyte.
explanations.d: Correct – all reagents except the analyte are present.

explanations.c: Correct – this is the IUPAC name for aspirin.
explanations.d: This is a precursor to aspirin.
